body:
Comment 1: 
Apparently gcc does not raise any error on the code that is used for generating the
DWARF debug info. A similar issue appears when using non-existent structs.

I propose a small patch http://golang.org/cl/5336041
that makes cgo print

_test.go:6:13: unusable type C.enum_x: no info found for C type 'enum x'
